section_title: Secretary of State’s power to control use of dangerous materials or apparatus in educational establishments.
section_text: 1 The following section shall be inserted after section 19 of the  Education (Scotland) Act 1980—  Secretary of State’s power to control use of dangerous materials or apparatus in educational establishments. 19A 1 The Secretary of State may by regulations make provision for requiring his approval to be obtained for the use in such educational establishments as may be specified in the regulations of such materials or apparatus as may be so specified, being materials or apparatus which could or might involve a serious risk to health. 2 The power referred to in subsection (1) above includes power to make different provision in respect of different educational establishments.
2 This Act may be cited as the Education (Amendment) (Scotland) Act 1984 and shall come into force at the end of the period of two months beginning with the day on which it is passed.
